# The `indexed_accessor_range` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class provides an implementation of a range of indexed&#95;accessor&#95;iterators where the base is not indexable. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class provides an implementation of a range of indexed&#95;accessor&#95;iterators where the base is not indexable.

Ranges with bases that are offsetable should derive from indexed&#95;accessor&#95;range&#95;base instead. Derived range classes are expected to implement the following static method:
<ul>
<li>ReferenceT dereference(const BaseT &amp;base, ptrdiff&#95;t index)
<ul>
<li>Dereference an iterator pointing to a parent base at the given index.</li>
</ul></li>
</ul>

Definition at line 1391 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlextras-h">STLExtras.h</a>.
